Key Match Events: Javier Sanoja recorded an RBI in his Major League debut and followed up with two hits in his first start against the Philadelphia Phillies.
Pre-Game Insights: Miami Marlins manager Skip Schumaker highlighted Javier Sanoja's ability to handle pressure and his willingness to make pitches inside the strike zone during his Major League debut.
Post-Match Reflections: Javier Sanoja expressed his emotions about making his Major League debut and being part of the Marlins' victory against the Philadelphia Phillies.
